price: ពួកគេអង្គុយផ្អែកខ្លួននៅលើពូកដែលក្រាលព្រំំធ្វើពីសូត្រ ក្រាស់។ ហើយផ្លែឈើនៃឋានសួគ៌ទាំងពីរនោះគឺនៅក្បែរពួកគេ។
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā furushin baṭāinuhā min is'tabraqin wajanā al-janatayni dānin
